bibl.title: School Notes.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists

bibl.note: The extensive annotations of P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 29817 (= Pack2 1356), a 6th-century copy of Pythian 1, supply primary evidence about contemporary pedagogical methods. - I. The Arrangement of the Notes. - II. The Content of the Notes.
bibl.seg: Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 177-184.
